valueCoding.display: Influenza, high-dose (Flu, for people 65 and older)
Japanese encephalitis (Ixiaro, for people > 16 years old)
Not commonly used or not available in U.S.
Japanese encephalitis (JE-VAX, not available since May 2011)
Disease risk based on family history
X-ray or other radiology tests and/or results

item.text: To add add tests results and trackers, open a new window and then use the "Search LOINC Panels" tab on the left to select a new form. Each form will be saved in its own file.
